Package ui

Class PromptInterface

java.lang.Object
ui.PromptInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class PromptInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserInterface
Implementation of a user interface

    Constructors

    PromptInterface()
    Constructs a new PromptInterface.

  • Constructor Details

    • PromptInterface

      public PromptInterface()
      Constructs a new PromptInterface.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Runs the interface. In a PromptInterface, this loops until the user quits. In this loop, the interface empty its command queues, then asks the user to feed it with a new one.
      Specified by:
      run in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      args - arguments passed to be treated when launching the interface.

    • executeCommand

      public boolean executeCommand()
      Executes next command. The command must have been pushed to a queue before calling this method, hence a previous call to offer or offerScript is required.
      Returns:
      true if a command was found, false otherwise.

    • fetchCommand

      public CommandInterface fetchCommand​(java.lang.String str) throws UnknownCommandException
      Fetches a command given a string.
      Parameters:
      str - command name to search for.
      Returns:
      the command corresponding.
      Throws:
      UnknownCommandException - if the name did not match any command name defined by the interface.

    • getCommandList

      public java.util.ArrayList<CommandInterface> getCommandList()
      Returns the list of commands linked to the interface.
      Returns:
      the list of commands.

    • isCommand

      public boolean isCommand​(java.lang.String cmd)
      Indicates whether a string matches a command.
      Parameters:
      cmd - command name to check.
      Returns:
      true if cmd matches a command, false otherwise.

    • keyWord

      public int keyWord​(java.lang.String key) throws UnexpectedKeyWordException
      Returns the integer corresponding to a key word of the interface.
      Parameters:
      key - keyword to search for.
      Returns:
      the integer corresponding.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedKeyWordException - if the keyword is not defined by the interface.

    • offer

      public void offer​(java.lang.String cmd)
      Pushes a command to the main queue (commands entered by the user directly. It does not check whether the command can be executed.
      Parameters:
      cmd - the command to push.

    • offerScript

      public void offerScript​(java.lang.String cmd)
      Pushes a command to the script queue (commands found in a script. It does not check whether the command can be executed.
      Parameters:
      cmd - the command to push.

    • setVariable

      public void setVariable​(java.lang.String variable, java.lang.String value)
      Initializes a variable.
      Parameters:
      variable - label of the new variable.
      value - value of the new variable.

    • fetchVariable

      public java.lang.String fetchVariable​(java.lang.String variable) throws UninitializedVariableException
      Fetches a variable.
      Parameters:
      variable - label of the variable to search for.
      Returns:
      the value of the variable.
      Throws:
      UninitializedVariableException - if the variable was never set via a call to setVariable.

    • getVariables

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getVariables()
      Returns a list of current variables associated with their values.
      Returns:
      a HashMap with a list of the variables.

    • quit

      public void quit()
      Indicates the interface the user quits. The interface may not effectively quit on call to this method.

    • startRecording

      public void startRecording()
      Indicates the interface to record next commands from direct user input. The previous record is deleted on call to this method.

    • stopRecording

      public void stopRecording()
      Indicates the interface to stop recording.

    • getRecord

      public java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> getRecord()
      Returns the last record.
      Returns:
      a queue containing the record.

    • modify

      public void modify()
      Indicates the maze has been modified to the interface.

    • save

      public void save()
      Indicates the maze has been saved to the interface.

    • wasModified

      public boolean wasModified()
      Indicated whether the maze has unsaved modifications.
      Returns:
      true if the maze was modified since last save, false otherwise.

    • getMaze

      public InterfaceableMaze getMaze() throws NoMazeOpenedException
      Returns the current maze.
      Returns:
      the current maze.
      Throws:
      NoMazeOpenedException - if no maze is opened.

    • getMazeSafe

      public InterfaceableMaze getMazeSafe() throws NullMazeException
      Returns the current maze assuming the calling method will not attempt to modify with an access method.
      Returns:
      the current maze.
      Throws:
      NullMazeException - if anything kept the maze to be built with default constructor.

    • getPi

      public Pi getPi()
      Returns Pi function used in Dijkstra algorithm.
      Returns:
      Pi function.

    • getPrevious

      public Previous getPrevious()
      Returns Previous function used in Dijkstra algorithm.
      Returns:
      Previous function.

    • getOutStream

      public java.io.PrintStream getOutStream()
      Returns the default stream used by the interface as the output.
      Returns:
      the output stream of the interface.

    • print

      public void print​(java.lang.String str)
      Writes in the output.
      Parameters:
      str - string to be written.

    • println

      public void println​(java.lang.String str)
      Writes in the output and adds a new line character.
      Parameters:
      str - string to be written.
